mainHero.title: Algrothims powered with
mainHero.subtitle: Electronics
mainHero.description: Welcome to Elgorithm, where we're transforming the way coding is learned through an exciting fusion of creativity, algorithms, and electronics. Our platform introduces an innovative approach by seamlessly integrating microcontrollers and sensors, allowing students to witness the tangible results of their code interacting with the physical world. With block programming at the forefront, coding becomes a breeze for all ages – a simple drag-and-drop process that visualizes the intricate world of algorithms.

items.title: Unleash Your Coding Creativity with the Ultimate Mini Computer!
items.description: Dive into the future of programming with our cutting-edge mini computer, ProCode. Seamlessly connect ProCode to our user-friendly website, where the power of block programming awaits. This compact device is designed for tech enthusiasts of all ages, providing an unparalleled hands-on experience that makes coding a breeze.

items.title: Low code to pro-code
items.description: With easy plug-and-play functionality, ProCode accommodates all skill levels, offering block programming for effortless code creation. Explore versatile applications, from basic projects to advanced innovations, and join a vibrant community for collaborative learning. ProCode isn't just a device; it's your gateway to coding excellence. Start your coding journey today with ProCode – where innovation meets simplicity!

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
